Idioma2:
Overview

- Release date: 2020, October
- Known as Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G, Samsung Galaxy S20 Fan Edition, Samsung Galaxy S20 Lite
- Android 10
- Size of 159.8 x 74.5 x 8.4 mm
- 190 grams

Display

- 6.5" FullHD 20:9 resolution (2400 x 1080)
- Super AMOLED
- Screen-to-body ratio: ~84.8%
- 407 ppi density

Memory

- 128 / 256 GB mass storage
- Expandable with microSD up to 512 GB (uses SIM slot)
- 6 / 8 GB RAM (LPDDR5, 2750 MHz)

Battery

- Non-removable 4500 mAh battery
- 33 hours talk time (3G)

Sensors

✔ Gyroscope
✔ Accelerometer
✔ Proximity
✔ Compass
✔ Barometer

Processor

- Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 (1 Kryo 585 up to 2.84 GHz + 3 Kryo 585 up to 2.42 GHz + 4 Kryo 585 up to 1.8 GHz)
- GPU: Adreno 650

Cameras

- 12 MP (f/1.8 and sensor size 1/1.76"), 8 MP (f/2.4 and sensor size 1/4.5") and 12 MP (f/2.2 and sensor size 1/3.0") main cameras
- 32 MP (f/2.2 and sensor size 1/2.74") front

✔ Optical + Electronic Image Stabilizer
✔ Main LED flash
✘ Front LED flash

Sound

- Loudspeaker(s): Stereo
- Microphone(s): Stereo
- AKG

Connectivity

- Supports 5G up to 2 Gbps
- Bluetooth 5.0
- Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax

✘ Headphone jack
✘ Type-C USB
✔ OTG USB
✘ FM Radio
✔ NFC
✘ eSIM

· 3G networks

Additional features

- Always-On display
- Dual SIM version
- Fast battery charging
- Fast wireless charging
- Fingerprint reader
- IP68 certified
- Reverse wireless charging
- Samsung Pay
- USB Power Delivery 3
